format: html

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("here")
```

```{r}
nt_meta_path <- here("_raw/neurotransmitter-receptors-dirty-meta.csv")
nt_dirty <- read_csv(nt_meta_path, show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
nt_dirty <- nt_dirty |> select(-`3D_Structure_URL`, 
                               -`Subunit_Structure`)

nt_dirty |> head()
```

```{r}
nt_dirty |> 
  count(Organism, name = "value") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = "", y = value, fill = Organism)) +
    geom_col(width = 1) +
    coord_polar(theta = "y") +
    scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "turbo") +
    theme_void()
```
